metadata.title: Financial Performance Analysis of the State Bank of India: Growth, Challenges, and Future Prospects (2022-2024)
metadata.description: The State Bank of India (SBI), the largest public sector bank in India, serves as a vital pillar in the country’s financial ecosystem. This research paper provides a comprehensive analysis of SBI’s financial performance during the fiscal years 2022 to 2024, with a focus on key parameters such as deposits, borrowings, advances, and asset quality. The study employs tools like ratio analysis and trend evaluation to assess the bank’s growth trajectory, operational efficiency, and overall financial stability. Special emphasis is placed on evaluating the reduction in non-performing assets (NPAs), the bank’s capital adequacy, and the impact of external borrowing costs.
keywords: Financial Performance, Non-Performing Assets, Capital Adequacy, Deposits and Advances, Banking Sector Growth

data.title: Financial Performance Analysis of the State Bank of India: Growth, Challenges, and Future Prospects (2022-2024)

metadata.title: Analysis of Women's Approach to Investment: A Theoretical Perspective
metadata.description: Investment has traditionally been a male-dominated market. Women are under-represented in the financial markets. Although female participation in the workforce is on the rise and women’s economic empowerment is increasing, there is still a significant gender gap in investment behaviour. This research paper provides in-depth analysis of the social, cultural, psychological and economic factors that influence women’s investment behaviour through a thorough review of existing research and theoretical frameworks. By exploring the theme of this research, the study aims to gain a better understanding of unique issues and opportunities that women realise in the investment world. This paper also emphasizes the need for personalized strategies and interventions to help women become more active and confident in their investment roles. In conclusion, the findings from this analysis contribute to a broader debate on gender equality in finance and offer valuable lessons for policymakers, financial institutions and teachers who are trying to promote inclusive and sustainable economic growth.
keywords: Women, Investment Attitudes, Socio-cultural Factors, Psychological Factors, Financial Literacy, Risk Perception, Institutional Barriers.

data.title: Analysis of Women's Approach to Investment: A Theoretical Perspective

metadata.title: A Study of Investment Avenues Available to Investors in the Indian Security Market
metadata.description: In the Indian security market, there are numerous investment opportunities for investors looking to invest their capital. This paper seeks to conduct an empirical analysis of the different investment avenues available in the Indian security market. By conducting a thorough review of literature, analysing historical data, and examining current market trends, this study assesses the performance, risk, and potential returns associated with various investment options. Traditional avenues such as equities, bonds, debentures and mutual funds are explored, as well as newer alternatives like ETFs, SGB, Digital Gold, REITs and securities available for individual investors in Money Market. By evaluating factors such as historical returns, volatility, liquidity, and regulatory environment, the pur- pose of this study is to explore the attractiveness of various investment options for investors in India.
keywords: Indian Security Market, Investment Avenues, Equities, Bonds, Mutual Funds, Derivatives, Gold, Performance Analysis, Risk Assessment.

data.title: A Study of Investment Avenues Available to Investors in the Indian Security Market

metadata.title: Medical Smart E-Card for Keralites
metadata.description: This paper proposes to conceptualize a smart card application interface to electronic medical records for the Indian healthcare market and to study the practical applicability of integrating electronic medical record information with an existing service like banking, health insurance or the proposed Citizens’ card. A lot of morbidity and mortality due to drug interactions, allergic reactions or misdiagnoses can be prevented if medical professionals and care givers have access to proper medical records. At lot of times the information is inaccessible, inaccurate, lacking in detail or out dated. Accessing certain vital medical information makes the difference between life and death in an emergency situation
keywords: PHP, DFD, HTML, javascript, jquery, AJAX CSS

metadata.title: Local Geohistory Project: Application
metadata.description:
The Local Geohistory Project aims to educate users and disseminate information concerning the geographic history and structure of political subdivisions and local government. This repository contains the application code used to power the project website. The application runs using the CodeIgniter 4 framework on a LAPP (Linux, Apache, PostgreSQL, PHP) stack, but can run on other operating systems when built using Docker.

This repository does not contain the data, which can be found in the Open Data repository.

metadata.title: Next Gen: AI Powered ERP
metadata.description: Enterprise resource planning (ERP) systems have become essential tools for organizations looking to streamline, integrate, and improve decision-making. The program explores the development and implementation of an ERP system based on the organization’s needs, using technologies such as artificial intelligence (AI) to improve operations. The ERP system is intended to integrate key processes such as resource management, financial operations, human resources, student management, and educational planning into a user-friendly platform at its core. AI-enabled features such as process automation and real-time information are integrated. Optimize efficiency and facilitate data-driven decision-making. These improvements allow organizations to forecast resource needs, customize services, ensure compliance, and support growth plans. The project outlines architecture, data integration, and implementation methods, emphasizing scalability, security, and user-friendliness. And decentralized information management provides a solid foundation for organizations to achieve efficiency and flexibility in a dynamic environment.

metadata.title: Hospital Management System Using PHP
metadata.description: A Hospital Management System (HMS) is a software or app—whether it's for the web, desktop, or mobile—that helps manage different tasks in a hospital. A good HMS ensures everything runs smoothly in the hospital, including administrative work, patient management, billing, appointment scheduling, and medical records into a single, user-friendly platform. In this project, we aim to design, develop, and analyze hospital management software. The goal is to understand its key features, how it works, and how it can improve the healthcare system in my country by making it more efficient, effective, and patient-centered. It is key to the successful operation of a healthcare facility.

metadata.title: ФАКТОРЫ РИСКА И СВЯЗЬ С ДРУГИМИ ЛЕКАРСТВАМИ ПРИ СЕДАЦИИ АЗОТ ОКСИДОМ В ДЕТСКОЙ СТОМАТОЛОГИИ
metadata.description: Закись азота (N2O), — бесцветный газ со сладковатым вкусом. Оказывает анксиолитическое и седативное действие, а также способствует мышечной релаксации и анальгезии. N2O не раздражает дыхательные пути, имеет минимальную альвеолярную концентрацию и низкую растворимость в тканях. Он действует с быстрым началом и быстрым восстановлением, вся процедура длится всего несколько минут. Считается это безопасным и эффективным базовым методом контроля, который позволяет снизить тревожность ребенка и способствует улучшение коммуникации между детским стоматологом и ребенком.

metadata.title: Development of an Early Prediction System for Flood Disasters Based on the Internet of Things (IoT) with the Application of Deep Learning
metadata.description: In this study, we propose the development of an integrated approach to flood prediction systems using the implementation of an artificial neural network approach on the backend system to improve the accuracy of the results. In this study, we propose the development of an integrated approach to flood prediction systems using an artificial neural network approach on the backend system. The Internet of Things (IoT) device used consists of a raspberry pi connected to an ultrasonic sensor and a web camera module. The ultrasonic sensor is used to measure the distance to the water surface, while the web camera module is used to take photos of the current river conditions. Our experiments show that our system successfully monitors river water level conditions, displays data on a web platform, and analyzes data for flood prediction using machine learning with an MSE error rate of 0.038%.
references: Gomathy, CK, GG Lasya, P., & Kumar, H. (2021). A Study on IoT Based Flood Detection Management System. International Journal of Engineering and Advanced Technology, 10(4), 130–133. https://doi.org/10.35940/ijeat.d2407.0410421.

metadata.title: Characteristics of Heat Transfer and CFD Analysis of Pulsating Heat Pipes with Distilled Water
metadata.description: Pulsating Heat Pipe be there an influence process of hotness allocation in liquid and vapour phase change in process. This papers consider an investigational work on pulsating heat pipe through Distilled Water by way of working fluid. It is prepared from copper material having internal diameter 3mm and single turns. The PHP filled through Distilled Water fluid with varying filling ratio of 45%, 55%, 65%, 75% and 85% of its volume. Heat Input differentiating for 120W, 240W, 360W, 480W, 600W. Evaporator section is for charging dissimilar filling ratio, varying heat input. The results obtained that intensification on the heat input with the thermal heated by using flat plate mica heater and condenser section cooled by heat exchanger. Considered on closed loop PHP more effective impact on heat transfer of filling ratio, The investigation require accepted resistance diminutions rapidly and it is perceived that lesser rate of thermal resistance is achieved at a filling ratio of 55%.It is found that for Distilled Water measured for calculating heat transfer performance at 600W, evaporator temperature is 261.5778℃ and condenser temperature is 57.062℃, thermal resistance is 0.0.13 0C/W, heat transfer coefficient is 475.32W/m2-0C and hence exhibits good enactment at a filling percentage of 55% and Analysis of control volume fraction of Pulsating heat pipe.

data.title: Characteristics of Heat Transfer and CFD Analysis of Pulsating Heat Pipes with Distilled Water
